abstract: Violent clashes pit Burundi's security forces against armed members of political opposition still protesting Pres Pierre Nkurunziza's contentious attempt to claim third term; Bujumbura residents are anxious and confused as innocent civilians seem to be among victims in latest confrontation in capital, which claimed dozens of lives.
lead_paragraph: Dozens of bodies, some with their hands tied behind their backs, were strewn across the streets of Bujumbura, the capital, on Saturday, a day after coordinated strikes by unidentified gunmen.

headline.main: Political Violence in Burundi Exacts Growing Toll
headline.print_headline: Political Violence in Burundi Exacts Growing Toll

snippet: Dozens of bodies, some with their hands tied behind their backs, were strewn across the streets of Bujumbura, the capital, on Saturday, a day after coordinated strikes by unidentified gunmen.
